Tamu yang kami hormati,

Pertama-tama kami sampaikan terima kasih karena Anda telah meluangkan waktu untuk menulis sebuah ulasan sehubungan dengan pengalaman Anda tinggal di hotel Kami.

Kami memohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang telah Anda alami dan masukan Anda tentunya akan Kami tindak lanjuti untuk dapat meningkatkan pelayanan terhadap tamu.

Kepuasan tamu di Fox Harris City Center Bandung merupakan hal penting yang selalu Kami prioritaskan dalam memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik dan Kami harap Anda dapat merasakan hal tersebut pada kesempatan di kemudian hari.

“May the Fox be with you”,

text:
Pengalaman di hotel fox harus bandung..
Pertama masuk AC gak dingin. Alhamdulillah resepsionis dan teknisinya sigap sehingga AC bisa dingin tanpa kata lama. 

Pelayanan baik, ramah, pelayanan sarapan pagi baik, kualitas makanannya baik varoasinya juga lumoyan banyak dan bervariasi. 

Sekuriti juga baik, ramah dan komunikatif. Dengan ramah menjelaskan pertanyaan kita mengenai arah tujuan perjalanan dalam kota jika kita mau kemana kemana. 

Overall hotel fox harris tenang, nyaman dan enak ya.. Untuk keluarga liburan nginep di hotel fox haris tentunya semakin menyenangkan. 

Pergi ke Bandung untuk wisata
Jalan ke braga sambil belanja

Pergi beli sepatu di pasar cibatu
Jangan lupa jadikan fox harus sebagai hotelmu 

Spesial note : terima kasih untuk mbak Bintang (fox resto)

Dear 17joerotten,


Terima kasih atas masukkan yang anda berikan.
Kami senang pada akhirnya anda memiliki pengalaman yang berkesan dengan kami. Kami akan terus berusaha untuk meningkatkan kualitas produk dan pelayanan kami kepada semua tamu. Kami mohon maaf jika ada kendala pada air panas dan televisi di dalam kamar. Team terkait sudah melakukan pengecekan dan tindak lanjut secara menyeluruh di dalam kamar tersebut. Kami juga akan sampaikan apresiasi kepada Pak Alfa resepsionis kami atas pelayanan dan bantuan yang diberikan kepada anda.

Semoga dengan pelayanan yang berkesan ini, kami dapat menunggu kehadiran anda di kemudian hari.

Likie Handoyo

title: Family Staycation

owner_response.responder: General Manager FOX HARRIS City Center
owner_response.text:
Dear Ardhinys,

Terima kasih atas masukkan anda.
Kami senang anda menikmati kunjungan anda baru-baru ini dan kepuasan tamu adalah tujuan utama dari hotel kami. Terkait dengan kondisi kolam renang kami yang terletak di lantai atas dan sangat terpengaruh oleh kondisi cuaca saat itu, kami selalu melakukan perawatan setiap hari untuk mempertahankan kebersihan dan sanitasi di dalam kolam. Demi kenyamanan tamu, kami memiliki fasilitas yang cukup lengkap di area kolam renang. Tidak hanya ruang ganti dan bilas tetapi juga toilet yang terletak di sebelah roofbar pada lantai yang sama.

Sekali lagi, terima kasih atas masukan ini yang akan menjadi motivasi bagi kami untuk lebih baik lagi. Kami tunggu kunjungan anda berikutnya di FOX Harris City Center Bandung.

Hormat kami,

Likie Handoyo
General Manager

title: Pengalaman menginap di  Fox Harris

owner_response.responder: General Manager FOX HARRIS City Center
owner_response.text:
Dear Rudit2014,

Terima kasih sudah meluangkan waktu untuk memberikan masukan kepada hotel kami.
Kami selalu berusaha memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik kepada semua tamu-tamu kami karena kepuasan anda adalah tujuan utama kami. Saya mohon maaf jika ada produk kami masih kurang berkenan selama anda tinggal bersama kami. Saya akan melakukan evaluasi untuk kondisi bantal yang ada saat ini. Namun demikian, perawatan secara berkala terus kami lakukan dengan tujuan menjaga kualitas dari bantal tersebut. Kami sudah meneruskan informasi perihal air buangan yang kurang lancar kepada team engineering kami agar ditindak lanjuti dengan segera. Selain itu, kami selalu menyajikan variasi makanan pada saat sarapan dengan menu yang berbeda setiap hari. Tentunya kualitas dan cita rasa makanan tersebut kami jaga dengan baik sesuai standard dari koki kami yang handal.

Sekali lagi terima kasih atas saran dan masukkan nya. Kami tunggu kedatangan anda selanjutnya di FOX Harris City Center Bandung.


Hormat saya,

Likie Handoyo
General Manager

title: Pelayanan Terbaik

text:
Stay 1 malam di tengah2 pandemic virus seperti ini memang sulit tapi saya ga sadar servicenya bakal banyak yang kurang ini.

Pertama masuk kamar ternyata salah, minta king di kasih twin, di kasih kamar baru pun cuma kamar twin yang di sulap jadi kamar king (???)

Telepon mau room service katanya udah tutup ? bukan standar bintang 3 deh room service ga 24 jam (apa gara2 virus juga?)

Mandi malem2 jam 11 airnya ga panas, udah males komplen juga, yaudah lah di telen aja.

Ac lama banget dingin nya, butuh 30-40 menit buat dingin.

Yang parahnya aku dipesenin kamar yang include massage service cuman kata anak malem nya harus siang hari massagenya nanti pagi di kabarin, nunggu2 pagi ga di kabar2 in, akhirnya pas c/o aku tanya katanya emang lagi tutup sampe tanggal 1 (??), ya kabarin to mas/mba, jangan buat tamu nunggu, ga di kasih kompensasi juga buat service yang udah dibayar tapi ga di kasih.

Tapi kamarnya oke dan gede buat ukuran harga semurah itu. (apa saya di upgrade?)

Sempet mampir ke rooftop juga oke banget buat nongkrong sambil ngopi , cuman ga berani banget buat renang kalo lagi kaya gini.

Yang paling oke breakfast nya, dikarenakan mungkin hotel sepi, breakfastnya di ganti jadi pesen alacart gitu, ada continent/america/indonesia, coba yang america nya lumayan enak dan well cooked cuman kurang banyak aja hehe

hotel sama produknya bagus cuman diperbaiki aja service nya ya mas/mba biar tamunya betah.

thanks fox
title: Beberapa service yang kosong

Pelayanannya bagus, dilayani oleh training staff bernama Dea pelayanannya bagus ketika breakfast.

text: Sejak check in dan sepanjang menginap, saya sudah melihat kualitas pegawai yg tidak pengalaman. Dibanding hotel harris yg lain,baru kali ini saya melihat pegawai, yang tidak totalitas dg apa yg dikerjakan. Saya check in tgl 31 des 2018,jauh sebelumnya sudah memesan lgs dan membayar dg request 2 kamar berdekatan dan 1 bed besar. Saat saya datang  jam 3 sore. Hny 1 kamar yg ready dan 1 kamar lg dijanjikan 30 menit.saya request 1 bed besar, diiyakan. Saat diatas,kamar 511 ternyata 2bed disatukan dan kamarnya kotor sekali dg bercak bekas kopi yg besar dan disembunyikan dg meletakkan sofa bed. Besoknya saya minta noda dan kamar dibersihkan,yang terjadi adalah sampah2 bekas bungkus kado yg ditaruh di sudut ruangan tidak diangkat, sampah plastik sabun tetap ditempatnya, dan petugas yg membersihkan hari kedua hanya sendirian.. Jelas saja dia kelimpungan. Dibanding petugas keberaihan jaga sore yg rame tp bekerja dg lambat dan bergurau terus, padahal kita sudah komplain berkali2 mengenai kamar yg belum ready. Hal kedua adalah mengenai restoran,saat breakfast, makanan enak2,tapi petugas juga seperti tidak profesional, petugas yg menerima tamu, hny berdiri saja tidak ikut melihat bila ada piring2kotor yg blm diangkat, petugas yg lain juga hny membersihkan meja setelah lama dan harus diingatkan lagi oleh penghuni hotel. Tidak peka dan tidak senyum. Seperti bekerja terpaksa. Di kolam renang, petugas hanya ada saat ramai saja, kalau sepi bahkan di cafenya pun tidak ada orang,untuk meminta handuk,tidak tahu minta ke siapa. Kolam kotor, kursi reot. Bekas tahun baru tidak segera dibersihkan.kalau hotel yang tidak menyandang nama harris mungkin masih bisa dimaklumi. Tapi ini memakai nama harris,tp sangat2 tidak profesional. Recruitmen pegawainya tidak pas,bahkan termasuk manager in dutynya pun harus dibenahi saya rasa.. Kalau petugas yg bekerja di hari libur juga harusnya di tambah, apalagi high season, dan diberi kompensasi yg setimpal supaya kerja lebih profesional.. Masih banyak komplain sebenarnya. Saya tidak akan mau menginap lagi bila kinerja masih sama seperti yg sekarang
title: Akhir tahun yang tidak memuaskan

text: Menginap disini 1 malam untuk family vacation, kami pesan 2 kamar. Kamar yang 1 oke dan tidak ada masalah, namun kamar satunya saat masuk ada bau menyengat yang sangat mengganggu seperti karpet basah, sudah mnt housekeeping untuk rapihkan dan hilangkan namun tetap sangat menyengat baunya. Setelah info ke recepsionis akhirnya diganti dengan kamar baru, recepsionisnya helpfull sekali disini. Namun setelah pindah, kamar tetap tercium bau karpet basah (namun tidak sekuat yang sebelumnya), saat kami minta pindah lagi kamar sudah full. Kolam renang dan taman di rooftop sangat cantik. Kolam renang tidak terlalu besar. Pelayanan kamar sangat sigap dan cepat. Btw, di kamar yang kami datangi hanya menyediakan 1 pasang sendal hotel, bisa minta tambah. Untuk restoran, banyak variasi namun rasa perlu ditingkatkan untuk hotel bintang 4. Terimakasih
title: Pelayanan baik, Kamar perlu ditingkatkan!

text:
Dear Fox, 
Secara keseluruhan FOX, hotel yang sangat nyaman, lokasi strategis, breakfast nya enak, karyawan nya ramah. Room-rate reasonable, kamar nya bersih, kamar luas…overall nilai 9.

tapi sayang saya mendapatkan pengalaman yang TIDAK PROFESIONAL, kejadian bermula dari SAAT ISTRI SAYA SEDANG BERADA DI KAMAR DALAM KEADAAN BUKA CELANA (TIDAK PAKAI CELANA) ADA STAFF HOUSEKEEPING MENYELONONG MASUK !!!, Akhirnya saya ditelpon via handphone oleh Ex. Housekeeper (maaf saya lupa namanya) karena saya masih diluar karna ada kegiatan. saya dijelaskan dengan baik,sopan dan saya paham serta mengerti situasinya.saya utarakan kepada beliau di telpon, kalau lebih baik kita bertemu langsung, duduk bersama. Karna, maaf ?! yang mengalami trauma secara psikologis adalah istri saya, bukan saya (itu saya sampaikan ke Ex. Housekeeper) dan pada saat itu di kamar, istri saya menerima telpon dari Duty Manager permintaan maaf dan dikirimi fruit plate (tanpa ada yg visit ke kamar utk level manager – WHY!!).

Point yang membuat saya Sangat kecewa dan menilai tidak profesional:
1.	keluhan saya sudah saya sampaikan ke manager on duty saat breakfast dan via direct ke FO, datang ke hotel dan telepon ke FO (telepon kehotel 3 kali) saya tinggalkan nama dan nomor HP saya - TAPI TIDAK ADA YANG TELPON BALIK / RESPON
2.	Berkesan menghindar, yg akhirnya berkesan saya seperti akan minta Kompensasi ???!
3.	Ada yang salah dalam basic SOP, sebelum buka pintu kamar harus ketok pintu atau pencet bel terlebih dahulu (tidak dilakukan)
Sangat sayang dengan situasi ini, kami sudah menunggu reaksi FOX sejak January dan terus terang sampai saat ini saya masih happy dan nyaman menginap di FOX, cuman mungkin cara handle komplen yang perlu diperbaiki. Saya Mohon untuk lebih diperhatikan ke how to handle complain dan training basic, saya harap FOX HARRIS CITY CENTRE BISA MENERIMA DENGAN TERBUKA SARAN DAN KRITIK SAYA DAN SELALU SUKSES UNTUK FOX

Thank you
title: Knockin' on Fox Door

text:
Sebuah hotel yang lokasinya strategis, tapi jauh dari kebisingan. Ia megah, tapi juga nampak asri. Terasa mewah, tapi rate terjangkau. Itulah Oak Tree Premiere.

Staycation di hotel ini bulan lalu, Januari 2017. Lokasinya di jalan Jawa, dekat jalan Merdeka, dekat banget dengan Taman Vanda. Sekitar 5 menit jalan kaki kalau dari Bandung Indah Plaza. Sekitaran hotel banyak kulineran kaki lima, lumayan buat berhemat kalau kelaperan hehehe.

Lobbynya asyik banget. Luas, megah, nyaman, dan elegan. Staf yang menyambut juga ramah, dan proses check-in cepat. Sehingga tak lama bagi saya untuk bisa segera menuju kamar.

Kamarnya, terasa luas, lapang, dan kosong. Karena memang ada space yang seharusnya diisi sofa/sofabed, tapi ketika kemarin belum ada. Hotelnya sendiri memang masih "Soft Opening", jadi saya pun bisa memaklumi apalagi rate yang ditawarkan sangat di bawah hotel sekelasnya.

Namun selain itu, kamar terasa nyaman. Adanya space kosong malah menjadi kelebihan tersendiri. Bisa asyik kongkow sama teman-teman sembari lesehan. Atau shalat berjamaah di kamar secara leluasa hehehe.

Hiburan pun terasa oke, karena TV kabel berfungsi dengan baik. Pun jaringan internet yang cukup cepat, apalagi katanya akan ditambah lagi bandwithnya. Mantap.

Meski masih soft opening, tapi banyak fasilitas sudah bisa digunakan. Seperti meeting room yang seringnya terlihat ramai. Wajar sih, lokasi Oak Tree Premiere emang strategis banget.

Selain itu, room service juga sudah tersedia. Harganya sendiri juga ga terlalu mahal. Lumayanlah.

Di rooftop ada sky bar yang masih dalam persiapan. Meski sudah bisa disewa untuk private event. Ke depannya sih bakalan bisa buat ngeteh atau ngemil deh di sini. Sembari menikmati nuansa Bandung dari ketinggian.

Selain sky bar, ada pula kolam renang yang sudah bisa digunakan. Tapi (ketika itu) handuk masih belum ada. Jadi harus bawa dari kamar. Pun ruang bilas nampak belum sepenuhnya siap. Tapi kolam renangnya sendiri cukup asyik kok. Apalagi nantinya akan ada area untuk bermain anak-anak. Semakin cocok untuk hotel keluarga.

Saat breakfast sendiri, restorannya terkesan kurang sentuhan dekorasi unik buat saya pribadi. Terasa 'hambar'. Jadi kurang enak buat foto-fotoan. Tapi kalau dari segi menu, baik rasa dan keragaman sudah bisa diacungi jempol. Hanya memang ada beberapa catatan, karena masih ada yang terasa kurang kuat rasanya. Seperti ketika itu, Nasi Tutug Oncom hehehe. Padahal di hotel jarang sekali menemukan menu khas ini, jadinya tertarik mencobanya.

Untuk sekelas hotel bintang 3, yang nantinya akan disetting ke bintang 3 plus, hotel Oak Tree Premiere sudah bisa memberikan kepuasan yang standar. Karena fasilitas memang tersedia, tapi terasa kurang optimal. Memang masih dalam nuansa Soft Opening, apalagi rate yang masih sangat murah, membuat kita juga harus bisa memaklumi.

Luar biasanya, staf sangat ramah dan membantu. Secara khusus saya berterima kasih khusus kepada pak Heri, mbak Ana, yang sudah menyambut, menerima, bahkan menjamu saya dengan hangat.

Sebagai permulaan, hotel Oak Tree Premiere sudah memiliki awal serta modal yang bagus. Semoga selesainya pengerjaan nanti, bisa menjadikan hotel ini semakin istimewa. Terlebih lokasi dan nuansanya yang enak banget untuk liburan bersama pasangan atau keluarga.

Ulasan hotel ini juga bisa ditemui di postingan IG @hotelopedia.

Salam.
title: Megah, Terasa Mewah, tapi Asri dan Murah

text:
Saya menginap pada tanggal 13 Januari 2017 di tipe kamar superior, kamar nomer 223, berikut ulasan saya : 

1. Lokasi : 
Lokasi hotel ini sebenernya berada di tengah kota. Dekat dengan polwiltabes Bandung. Kalau siang daerah rame. Tapi kalau malam hari cenderung sepi. Bagi yang tidak membawa kendaraan agak sulit mencari angkutan kota, harus berjalan sedikit untuk menemukan angkutan kota. Tapi jalan sekitaran hotel bukan daerah macet. Kalau malam agak sulit mencari makanan karena tidak ada cafe atau penjual kaki lima di sekitar hotel. Minimarket juga tidak ada. 

2. Fasilitas: 
Hotel bintang 3 ini mempunyai fasilitas yang lumayan lengkap. Ada free wifi di setiap kamar dan tempat publik. Ada swimming pool yang tidak teralu luas tapi cukup untuk bersenang2 bersama keluarga yang terletak di roof top hotel sehingga memiliki pemandangan yg cukup indah. Tempat parkir mobil cukup luas dan ada basement. 24 jam room service dan ada restorant juga. Bagi yang pegal badan setelah seharian jalan ada fasilitas massage yg dipanggil ke kamar. 

3. Bedroom : 
Kamar superior luasnya sekitar 22 meter. Kebersihan cukup terjaga dengan baik. Kasur nya cukup empuk dilengkapi dengan 2 buah bantal. Fasilitas di dalam kamar ada ac yang bekerja dengan baik. Kemudian tv LCD yang dilengkapi dengan siaran tv kabel. Ada kettel pemanas air untuk membuat kopi/teh yang dikemas dengan tempat yang keliatan elegan. Free 2 buah botol air mineral. Ada 1 buah kursi kerja dan kaca rias. Lantainya memakai karpet yang cukup lembut. Kelemahannya kamar tidak kedap suara sehingga orang yang mondar mandir depan kamar sangat jelas suaranya ke dalam. 

4. Bathroom : 
Kamar mandi tidak begitu luas tapi cukup nyaman. Dilengkapi dengan shower yang mengeluarkan air panas/dingin dengan baik. Kebersihan kamar mandi cukup baik. Amenities mandi standart ada sikat gigi sampai dengan sabun. 

5. Service : 
Service di hotel ini sangat baik. Dari security di luar sampai petugas reception selalu melakukan greetings. Proses c.in dan c.out juga cukup cepat. Reception membantu mencarikan kamar sesuai request kami. Tidak ada keluhan untuk pelayanan di hotel ini. 

6. Food and Beverage :
Saya tidak sarapan di hotel sehingga saya tidak bisa menilai. 

Kesimpulan : 
Hotel ini cukup rekomendasi bagi para traveller yang mau menginap dalam jangka waktu pendek maupun lama.
title: Hotel dengan pelayanan prima

text: Awal datang sih overall baik dan memuaskan , kamar diupgrade tapi malah doble bed  adalah kasur twin bed dijadikan satu dengan ditutupi sprei doble bed 😪. Poin yang MENGECEWAKAN ADALAH Pas sarapan di resto hotel ini,,  melihat ada yg merokok di resto ini, padahal ruangan tertutup dan berAC.. ditanyakan dong ke pelayan setempat apakah ini smoking area, katanya INI BUKAN SMOKING AREA.. nahh kemudian saya minta pelayan tsb untuk mengingatkan orang yg merokok tsb untuk mematikan rokoknya. Ya walaupun masalah klise tapi sarapan diruang berac tp bau rokok mengurangi kenikmatan sarapan dan mood. Tapi yg kita lihat pelayan malah memberikan ASBAK dan menuju meja saya dg mengatakan bahwa DI BEBERAPA MEJA ADALAH SMOKING AREA.. Lah? Kok berubah ya jawabannya? Apakah dilema si pelayan takut mengingatkan customer dan mengecewakan customer lain? Dan ini adalah ruangan tertutup berAC tp bisa merokok? Walaupun dipisahkan mejanya, tapi ruangannya tdk terpisah atau minmal dikasi tulisan sebelah mana non smoking area jadi customer berhak memilih, jadi bagaimanapun asap rokoknya akan sampai paling tidak bisa lah menghindari untuk tidak menghirup. Nah satu lagi jangan kaget klo tiba2 terasa getar2 asik klo ada orang lewat diatas atau dilorong. Dan suara nya kurang kedap. Semoga pelayanannya bisa diperbaiki
title: Restoran yang kurang menyenangkan

text:
Kunjungan kedua kalinya ke Oak Tree. Masih soft opening, jadi belum semua fasilitas ada. Kunjungan pertama di kamar Deluxe Balcony kedua di Superior.

Review kunjungan pertama :
1. Proses check in oleh Dara, sangat membantu dan respon cepat. 

2. Kamarnya luas, tapi belum ada sofanya. Balconnya biasa aja tidak ada view. Saran, harusnya bisa disediakan asbak. Oiya, di dekat pintu tiba2 ada air tergenang. Rembesan dari kamar sebelah mungkin? 

3. Breakfast was...umm sorry to say not really good but it was ok

4. AC panas padahal sudah temperature kecil

Kunjungan kedua :
1. Kamar superior, better than the first padahal tipenya dibawah deluxe tidak ada balcon. Can't smoke in the room, but you can go to the balcon behind the Emergency Doors.

2. AC dingin banget. Tapi mati tiba2 jam 12 malam. Teknisi datang dan membantu tengah malam, sampai akhirnya saya dipindah kamar karena takes time untuk servicenya. Responnya cepat sekali dan inisiatif.

3. Sarapan, hmm was ok too. But I can't stop eating daging roladenya!! It was the only reason why I keep sitting on the resto:p

Lokasi nyaman karena tidak dipinggir jalan ramai, tapi agak berisik karena sering lewat pesawat, kalau kalian cari hotel dgn view, jgn kesini, tapi kalau cari yg tengah kota dengan kamar nyaman boleh kesini. (Always love the hotel room with carpet) Suka sekali dengan saklar yang dekat kaca! Mempermudah wanita. Hehehe... Amenities lumayan lengkap walaupun blm di branding. 

Parkiran ada basementnya. Liftnya lumayan lama. Daan akhirnya penasaran sama sky loungenya!!! Sayang belum jadi:( 

Thanks to Mba Mar, Angga, Dara, Tessa and Mas teknisi AC tengah malam (sorry I didn't ask the name) and also the other staffs.
title: Second Time

text:
I chose this hotel because its near a fave stop in Bandung. After mountain bike riding, I quickly check in, and I was a bit suprise, the hotel is only over a year. Room was clean, architecture is simple, cozy. The pool was on the rooftop, a bit too small, with nice view. The rooftop bar was not open, in fact I was gonna grab a quick drink. 
Not many choice of food for breakfast, but nevermind, I didnt intend to eat a lot.
I was given the spot to park at the lobby, and I loved this.
Overall, well recommended.
title: Nice spot for an overnight trip in Paris van Java

text:
Ok now my overall experience was good and would love to give 4/5 stars but there are some major bad points to the hotel.
1) the hotel is under renovation,  they don't tell you when booking, 
2) not sure if we has a renovated room but to me it wasn't to a high standard,  no sofa,  toilet constantly dripping water, walls not great condition, AC not cold, carpet not good condition, bathroom a bit dark.
3) the rooftop bar is not existent and the swiming pool is not completed even they let you swim but it's dirty and my nephew got infected eye from the water.

The good points are
1) friendly staff 
2) nice building if renovated correctly 
3) beautiful views from rooftop will be good when pool and bar complete 
4) very nice breakfast 
5) comfortable bed
6) quite location and lots of local food near

So the main problem is the renovation which is the main thing that gave me some disappointed and from the reviews this renovation has been happening for a long time now and they should inform guest better.

Overall still a good stay and has potential.
title: Could be very good

text:
You will find this hotel in a quite surrounding. Many big trees around and birds as well.

There is no convenient store nearby nor open air restaurant.

You have to walk around 500mtrs away to get some cafes with various foods in Jln Sumatra.

The hotel itself is a small hotel and not so budgeted.

Parking lot is a bit hard there.

We arrived at 0930pm and the staff sincerely assisted; we upgraded our room with quick process. We got welcome drinks to release our tired.

The room is clean and well arranged. Only the amenities needs to be improved.
So far no major complaint for the room.

Reception is a pleasant. They let us check in earlier 12:00 noon. I did not take breakfast at the hotel, better enjoy outside food because it's Bandung, city of best food.

Warmest regards,
Koeshadianto - Manager

locations.name: Fox Harris Hotel City Center Bandung

text:
I have never stayed in any Oak Tree Hotels before, but I'd def never stay in an Oak Tree Hotels ever again.

Me and my partner arrived really late at 11pm, I am not sure how the check-in was as I was asked by the security to wait to park my car meanwhile they were rearranging the parking lot, which was packed and seriouly, waiting to park my car?. 
I know I am highly adaptive as I have stayed in wide-ranging hotels from a bed & breakfast, budget to a five stars. I surely had a way better experience about parking when I was in Jogja, though I drove an old Jeep, they have the manner to offer parking services. This time I drove a sedan which supposedly easier to drive, but no offerings. And I am comparing and apple to apple. Failed to meet my minimum expectation.

Going up to the room we turned out to have a twin-bedded room. Which was not mentioned on check-in process when I check with my partner, assuming they would assign us on king-bedded room. 
The bed seems movable, so we could have a hollywood-styled twin bed, but doing that ourself is a huge question, not to say, it was 11pm. I ended up doing that myself.
On our entrance to the room, there's this unpleasant smells, so my partner checked the bathroom and I checked the bedroom, our findings; 
1. The carpet is so dirty, I am sure it wasnt vacuumed prior to my arrival. Felt so dirty when I walked with barefoot.
2. There was small cockroach cruising the carpet. Then I regret I walked without slipper.
3. When I took the slipper, something small drop from it, which was an orange seed. How the heck it got there?.
4. Then I found that all the surface at the desk, felt the bed too, dusty. Thick dust.
5. In between my finding, my partner was terrified to found that the toilet bowl was dirty, brown colored.
6. Then I checked the bathroom further, the floor looks like this room never been clean properly as I saw a large amount of dried-up puddle of water. Everywhere.
7. As well as a nearly microscopic-small worm in the washbasin. Added to the list of our terrifying arrival experience.
8. By the way, no bathroom amenities!.
9. And the tissue box in the bathroom is as well dusty.

I ran a quick thorough inspection afterward to the whole room, later to see that there's gap in-between the door frame and the wall, the edge of the washbasin and the carpet edge is untucked. I can say that this room was not properly inspected when handed over from the contractor to the hotel operator. 
After all the horrific arrival experience, my partner called the Front Desk to see if there's a possibility for us to have another room which was immediately turned down because they had 100% occupancy on the night.
Then we asked housekeeping to be send to the room, he done all that in a 5 mins time-frame, included the bathroom. How ensuring is that? Both me & my partner being sarcastic and found it is still dusty, still has the dried-up puddle, he only did the toilet bowl and quickly vacuum the carpet.
Based on my short conversation at the parking lot, the hotel was 4 months old and the night I stay was the first time they have 100% occupancy, which is unlikely very bold yet irresponsible to have all the room sellable.

Now, after a 3 hours driving from Jakarta, checking-in to a room with such condition, to a hotel with such situation. We dont want to add an exhausting complaint wasted to our trip. We looked out for another hotel immediately and decided to shortened our stay, checked-out in the morning. We managed to have a real quick rest at 3 am-ish, as we are exhausted.

If it wasnt because of our friend's suggestion to stay at Oak Tree, which has turned into our dissapointment, Oak Tree has simply thrown out the trust given by our friend. At the rate of 500k, I can get myself a better yet cleaner room in Bandung. And I hope readers of my review wont experience the horrific night we had at Oak Tree Hotel.

Oh by the way, our breakfast experience is, too, disappointing. Messy setup, not attended and fruit-flies everywhere you can see.

A note for the management; I can say, in this era of smart-small hotel with a modern and clean concept, if Oak Tree continue to operate in such way. No brainer, not going to survive the long run.
title: Not-so Premiere~

We also really appreciate your feed back and giving us a room for improvement to better ourselves.

Your positive notes after the issue was really assuring that overall we have done the rest to your expectation. Again, this is the best compliment we can get for customers like yourself.

In regards to the service and product, we would like to explore further on how we can improve it for our customers. If you don't mind you can reach me directly at bandung.gm@oaktree-hotels.com

We look forward to welcoming you back at our hotel on your next visit to Bandung.


Warmest regards,
Fery Ferdiansyah - General Manager

text: We booked the premiere double room as it stated that the room would provide 1 double bed, 1 single bed and 1 sofa bed and we are a family of 4. Firstly, as we entered the room, the first thing we noticed was the absence of the sofa bed in the room when there was clearly enough space beside the window. When we called the receptionist, they simply stated that the sofa was not available. In addition to the lack of facility they claimed they would provide, I entered the bathroom to find the toilet water to be yellow. I flushed the toilet yet the water color remains yellowish. Not only the toilet water, but the faucet and shower water as well. The next morning, we decided to check out the rooftop pool and we were shocked to see that it was still not finished and many sharp floor tiles or bricks were placed on the floor where any running children could have been hurt by. It was dangerous as there was no safety precaution or anything that could guard the rooftop edge. Finally, they were still using only one lift so it took quite some time to get to the lobby and back. However, despite this, we do understand that the hotel is still in the process of pre-opening and we suggest that the hotel try to finish their building as fast as possible and fix the problems they have regarding their facilities before the hotel gets more and more crowded. The food of the hotel was also delicious so we were able to have a good breakfast for the next day.
title: Cozy, but lots of setbacks

text:
It's a great experience to stay in FOX. 

But please enhance the synchronization between FDA and Room div. When They have already proceeded our c/i process, there was a problem with the room information updates.  We need 1 double and 1 twin bed, they acknowledged our needs, but before giving the key, they said that one of the rooms has been set up to be a triple bed. Luckily for them,we need extra bed so we take it,and we don't have problem with it. But How if we didn't need an extra bed?  But thanks to icha and nia who welcomed us very well and warm,also fulfill our needs very well. 

Please note that 1 room with extra bed means 3 person stay inside it and they need their own amenities (Bcause we just got 2 amenities). 

And please fix the bathroom problem,like shower and tap water flow. I felt like showering with some drops of water. 

Shout out to F&B staff Rasya and Aldo who are very humble and have a great hospitality skills. Especially rasya who completely fulfill my needs when i have a bfast,even though it was time for him to back home,but he was willing to extend his time for me. 
Also shout-out to Pak Ahmad as a security guard who welcomed us very nice and warm. 

And please give your Trainees (especially HK n F&B) an uniform, they have to be looks same as a staff,so they can work confidently. Because it seems that they didn't feel confident if they're not wearing an uniform,i can feel it and they Cant work professionally. And please train them about hotel information and details,because i feel like they are lack of information n knowledges, like where i can smoke inside the hotel,and what time the swimming pool close. 

And please enhance n fix your bfast buffet flavor n quality,it was cold and when i ate ayam rendang,it doesn't taste like Rendang at all,. But shout out to your Culinary trainee who handled the egg station,she gave me the perfect omelette and scrambled eggs.  And please add more variation of bfast menu. Thank you.
title: Great experience but need some improvement

text:
The first room had cigarettes smell (even though it's non smoking room)

text:
For the first time staying at Fox Harris City Center Bandung.  Why did I choose this hotel because there is a big name "HARRIS".  I booked a twin bed smoking room to stay for 4 days 3 nights starting from Friday 3 January (I check in around 22:30 a.m.) - Monday 6 January 2020.
 At check-in I was given room number 115 which is quite spacious and equipped with a sofa.  But unfortunately the seat backrest is broken, after checking it turns out there are no bolts at the bottom.  Fortunately, it was not occupied, I could tumble backwards.  The smoking room has an exhaus that doesn't work so cigarette smoke fills the room so several times I have to open the door of the room so that cigarette smoke can come out.  The water heater in the toilet didn't work properly, because until I set it full to hot but the water that came out only felt a little warm (it could be said tended to cool)
 After I complained to the customer service and request to move rooms the next day, we were given room number 123 which is equipped with balcony facilities.  The size of the room is indeed smaller with a double bed (according to CS officers), equipped with a sofa bed and for those of you who smoke I suggest to request / book a room with a balcony.  At night when I sleep, the mattress feels awkward because it really feels that this is actually a room with twin beds and NOT DOUBLE BED.  I opened the bed sheet and it turned out to be true. These are 2 twin mattresses put together and then covered with a double bed sheet to make it look like a large mattress.  I can't understand what kind of hotel like this?  That's a lie!  Room cleanliness conditions are also very lacking.  The curtains are dull and have not been washed for a long time, the carpet also seems to be rarely cleaned, what a shame!  The entire floor in the first floor hallway from the elevator to the room is also dirty, never washed especially in the mop, a lot of stains can actually disappear if the hotel management intends to TAKE CARE of this hotel.  For the service of the hotel staff it is really minus.  I asked for a change of drinking glasses until the day I changed, even though I have repeatedly called house keeping & CS.  The CS officer who served me at check-in named Epul was not good enough, the service seemed indifferent, while the other CS who replaced Epul was very friendly and served my complaints very well.  So far, my impression of staying here is unsatisfactory and for me personally maybe next time I will choose another hotel whose room cleanliness and hotel facilities are better than here.  For you lovers of cleanliness, instead of wasting money staying in this hotel, it's better to choose Yello Hotel in Paskal 23 or Moxy Hotel in Dago whose quality and service is much better.
title: Uncomfortable and unimpressed

text:
The hotel is strategically located in Jl Jawa, a side road just a stone's throw away from Balai Kota Bandung. Jl Jawa itself is relatively quiet, but within 10 minutes walk you can reach the ever-bustling Jl Braga. Bandung Cathedral is just down the street. Beware though,that the nearest convenience store ( Indomaret ) is 10 minutes walk away, so get prepared with your necessities prior to check-in. The hotel is also only a 10-15 minutes drive from Bandung train station ( BD ).

The ambience of the hotel is modern chic. The rooftop pool & lounge is unmanned all the time I get there ( 3 times : 3PM, 9PM & 8 AM ), and I have the space literally for me & my family. The rooftop pool & lounge itself provides a great photo opportunity, if you like to take selfies or pose like a model. There seems no one is using the pool during my stay.

The room itself is nice and modern, with spotless linen and clean bathroom. The TV in my room ( room 218 ) have a minor issue regarding the brightness ( the TV is a bit dim, and I can't correct it ). Room walls / partition is a bit thin, you can hear people walking, running and talking outside your room. View from the room is not special, you can only see the surrounding buildings from your room. You can get much better view from the rooftop, though.

I booked the room only package, so I can't comment on the food ( I prefer to have a culinary tour in Bandung 3 times a day ). The lobby is a bit small and get crowded easily. Parking may be an issue if you drive your own car, and it happens to be an event ( especially wedding ) at the hotel.

Things that can be improved : check-in process ... when I checked-in ( Saturday 2 PM ), the lobby is literally packed of people queueing for check-in, and there are only two staff at the front desk, total waiting time approximately 45 minutes, luckily I have registered earlier that morning ( around 9 AM ), so they have prepared my room, but other people that hasn't done so didn't get as lucky, since room cleaning process is still going on at that time.

Despite the check-in issue, staff performance was great though ( especially the front desk staffs ), and they never lose their smile and their willingness to serve.
title: Chic, Affordable Accomodation

text: I and my husband arrived around 5 PM on Saturday, 6 Apr 2019. We stayed for one night. The check in was fast, got room #302. We surprised that this room smell was very bad. It seemed that coming from the bathroom. The aircon also did not work well, the sound was disturbing. So, I reported to the front officer, told him the problems. Then,  an engineer came to our room, and fix the aircon, but the unpleasant smell still unsolved. I complained to the front officer, and he offered to find another room for us. while waiting, a housekeeping came to our room, and he sprayed room deodorant. I did not think it solved the problem. Finally, after waiting for around 20 minutes, we managed to move to another room! I choose Fox Harris because it is located near to Katedral Bandung. Well, I believe all rooms must be checked and Fox Harris must do the necessary maintainance to all rooms and the facilities.

text:
First, there's no short walking distance food stall around the hotel. We have to gojek our food from jalan Riau.
There's a mistake of giving us double bed while we booked for twin. But then the receptiont upgrade our room to deluxe. 
Deluxe room is spacious with a long sofa so it actually can fit to 3 adults, which is a plus point if you travel with family.
Bed however is small. Probably around 80cm-90cm wide only. Pillow flat. I have to woke up at night with hurt on my neck. Bathroom smell bad too.
Breakfast restaurant have a very good ambient. Cozy and modern look. But foods are bland. Omellete dry, ugly presentation and not many filling. I couldnt feel anything, not a hotel standard omellete. Breads are probably the most safe pick.
title: Just an ok hotel with a bit overprice

text:
Summary :
It was the first, yet, the last month (AFAIK) before the hotel name was changed into Fox Harris. Located in city center, a walk away to the City Hall. We (me and my family) had a pleasant stay, although the room size quite standard, but it's comfy, with carpet floor (which is my favorite kind of room). 
While you were staying in this hotel, take time to the rooftop, you'll get a nice view surroundings. The swimming pool also on rooftop, and mind the water, it's a bitsy-bit cold cause it's windy up there. There was a construction progress, I think for a rooftop cafe.
Anyway, congratulations for the conversion. Keep up the good service, and amenities. Whatever the name, service and amenities should be put FOX-ward! 😊

Pros :
- Location
Cons :
- Can you change the tv a bit larger? 😁
Stay Again :
SURE :)
title: 'Oak trans-Fox-mation'

text: We stayed at deluxe room for two night. At new years eve, they having a Dinner Even, quite cheap only 250k for a couple. So we bought the ticket. The variations of menu's are good, the Spaghetti was great, the pastry great also. But it's only until 10.00 PM, so if you came late, you'll lost your dinner. We notice many of the guest are have some relatively connection w/ the staff. Since we see the staff was packaging some food for some of the guest. We're ok w/ that, but i think as a 4 stars hotel, it wasn't inapropriate manner, since there are so many guests are still eating. In the next morning i also notice one of the staff, pick some bread from the "Bread Station" bring them to the back office and ate them. Oh my....really...? 4 stars hotel, managed by Tauzia?. Overall the room was big, over my expected, but the toilet need to upgraded. The breakfast was great also w/ so many variations, big thumbs up for Chef at Pasta Station.
title: Staff Improvement Manner & Upgrade for Bathroom

text:
Dear fox harris,

This is my first time stay in your hotel.I was stayed in Harris so I'm currious to try another property of Harris group.You have a great hotel,nice decoration,great food,and nice pool.BUT,you really need to trained your security.yes,I knew they are outsource security.I saw a name of company name in basement.but it doesn't mean they couldnt meet of your hotel standart manners.When they saw my husband picked me up at the lobby with motorcycle,they looked down on us (underestimated us).They didn't smile,they didn't greet us even we greeted them first.and when other guest drove a car,your security (they were two of them in the lobby) run to the car and shake his hand and greeted him with a very BIG Smile and said "good morning boss,how r u boss?" And I thought,ohhh welll im just a poor guests so they didnt care.

I was a hotelier,even my precious 5 stars hotel in Senayan ever had a guests drove KWK (red public transportation) and dropped them in the lobby the concierge,door girl,security still greet and smile to the guest. Will I back to this hotel?Im not sure.will I recommended this hotel to my colleague?im not sure either.Please trained them,so there is no more guests will feel the same I felt.
title: Dissapointed

Stayed here with my husband since Traveloka,com made mistakes with my booking at Meize Hotel, and they offered oak tree, I saw slightly the images in google and agreed with the offer. Check in was smooth , but room is a bit dirty and not well maintained. :(

Dear Ms. Sheila L,
